about_the_game:
Mirror Domain Adventures is an RPG style pixel art game. Set in a remote area known as "Astra City" our main character must navigate a day in the city that seems to repeat itself indefinitely. With every day being the same, there's always something new to explore. Perhaps the key to stopping this ever repeating day lies within the city itself.

Jump into the world of Mirror Domain using your own custom player character. With thousands of unique customization options you can create an avatar suited to your tastes. From there the sky is the limit. You can talk to a plethora of NPCs, all with unique dialogue and storylines. Complete puzzles, dip your toes in combat, and search for the items needed to finally bring an end to the loop you've been caught in.

short_description: After being interviewed by a mysterious individual you find yourself thrown head first into a new town. Not long after you find the day you've spent there is repeating! You're stuck in an inescapable loop! Will you find a way out, or will you be forced to relive the same day over and over again?
